backend/main.mo: Defines actor with authorization mixin and data types for programs, KPIs, team members, agendas, and comparison helpers for sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing frontend changes related to team member photo upload and cleanup of URL logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and pages for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables, themes, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the app root and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup gating, theming, and routing to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard metrics and charts component computing program/KPI statistics and rendering visual summaries with Recharts.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable delete confirmation dialog using alert-dialog UI components with cancel and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing attribution text and link with decorative heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar that shows logo, theme toggle, user profile menu, and handles logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating or editing a KPI, including program selection, PIC assignment, and numeric KPI fields.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: KPI management view with search, filters, table display, and actions for creating, editing, and deleting KPIs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Initial profile setup modal that collects a user's name and role and saves it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Displays a color-coded legend for program, agenda, and KPI calendar categories.
Provides category colors and computes per-day counts for programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines.
Provides an error boundary for calendar tabs with a reset option and fallback UI.
Renders a calendar day cell showing date, category indicators, and visual states based on month, density, and activity.
Shows a side panel listing programs active on a selected day with details and click handling.
Toggle buttons for switching calendar grid density between comfortable and compact.
Provides controls to switch calendar views between month, week, day, and agenda modes.
Displays detailed information for a selected program with optional edit support in a drawer panel.
Functions for filtering programs by criteria and counting programs active on a given day.
Maps program status and priority values to display labels and styling configs.
Builds a 14‑day grouped agenda list showing programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines by day with click handling.
Displays all programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines for a single day with status and priority badges.
Renders a month grid calendar and computes category counts per day for the visual day cells.
Creates a week‑view grid with per‑day category counts using DayCell components.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Comprehensive program calendar with month/week/day/agenda views, filters, reminders, and program detail/edit panels.
Error boundary wrapper for the program calendar that displays a fallback UI and resets related queries on retry.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Modal form for creating or editing a program, handling form state, validation, and submission via create/update queries.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Card component showing program details, priority/status badges, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Displays and filters a list of programs with search, sorting, CRUD actions, and program detail viewing.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: Combobox popover for selecting a related program with search and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Generates filtered program or KPI reports and supports exporting data to CSV.
frontend/src/components/team/ManagerSele: Dropdown for selecting a manager, excluding the current member and handling undefined values.
frontend/src/components/team/PhotoUrlPre: Previews a photo URL with avatar fallback and error handling indicating load success or failure.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberC: Displays a team member’s avatar, details, and optional edit/delete buttons in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberD: Displays a detailed side panel for a selected team member, showing avatar, role, manager, and direct reports with edit and close actions.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamStructu: Renders a hierarchical team node with selectable member info and recursively displays child nodes.
Builds and displays the org chart with hierarchy warnings and a details panel for selected members.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Modal form for creating or editing team members, including avatar upload, validation, and manager selection.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Lists team members with search, filtering, structure view, and supports creating, editing, and deleting members.
Renders an admin-only user profile management table with role editing, loading states, and access checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
Periodically checks programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines to trigger deduplicated 24h and 3h reminder toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query matches using window.matchMedia with listener setup and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, admin actions, program data, and date‑range program queries using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and utility animations and effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tab navigation, loading different sections and conditionally showing admin tabs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity with loading states and styled UI components.
frontend/src/utils/imageUpload.ts: Implements ImgBB image upload with validation, progress tracking, and base64 conversion.
frontend/src/utils/reminderDedup.ts: Manages local reminder deduplication with timestamped records and automatic expiry cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/safeBrowserStorage.ts: Wraps localStorage access with safe get/set helpers and fallbacks for restricted environments.
frontend/src/utils/teamHierarchy.ts: Builds a tree of team members, detects cycles or missing managers, and reports orphan nodes and warnings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/urlValidation.ts: Validates that a string is a properly formatted HTTP or HTTPS URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including calendar UX goals, issues, and feature metadata.
